name: A Day as a Hero - Team Lev
name_original: A Day as a Hero - Team Lev
description:
The game is a visual novel/simulation with multiple choices. It was developed by team Lev (Elly Color & Diana Michaella) with the occasion of Clujotronic 48h GameJam, 2021 edition.

As soon as Lev wakes up, he will be face to face with missions, requests, whims... and those annoying chest tablet calls. The player, who takes the role of Lev, has to choose the right activities to do in order to get through the day as a hero while keeping his energy levels on normal levels.

Will Lev be able to help those REALLY in need?

And what about that...that evil GENERAL TED?!

*** Please read the following notes: ***

Note: This visual novel might not be playable on mobile. You can play it on your PC or on your browser, by downloading one of the archives.

Note2: There might be an error or two, but they could be solved if you click "Ignore on the bottom of the error screen." These errors will be solved in the future.

Note3: There are a few misspellings, which will be corrected in the future.

Note 4: The energy levels will be corrected as well. Soon.

Note 5: Let me know if there will be any other problems or suggestions to improve this game. Thank you. :)
